scripts.build-test: ./node_modules/.bin/browserify -r mappersmith -t rewireify -s Mappersmith -o build/mappersmith.test.js && ./node_modules/.bin/browserify index.js -x mappersmith -t rewireify -s MappersmithCachedGateway -o build/mappersmith-cached-gateway.test.js
scripts.release: npm run build && ./node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs build/mappersmith-cached-gateway.js -o build/mappersmith-cached-gateway.min.js -c --screw-ie8 --preamble '/*! MappersmithCachedGateway - https://github.com/tulios/mappersmith-cached-gateway - Generated by browserify */'
